snippet.title: Shroom and Gloom - A deck-building, dungeon-crawling, first person tale of mushrooms and madness!
snippet.description:
Play for free on itch.io https://teamlazerbeam.itch.io/shroom-and-gloom?ac=qfCyYFQF-yt Descend into the unknown in Shroom and Gloom a first person, dungeon-crawling, deck-building tale of mushrooms and madness.

Enter The Underealm armed with nothing but a rust blade, a dying phone and a healthy appetite for roasted mushrooms. Explore your way through the depths, digging up new weapons in your quest to reach The Void King at all costs! Combine, grow and enchant your discoveries as you battle your way through terrifying Terry's, enchanting Bardshrooms and otherworldly Pizza Blobs!

➡️ More from Team Lazerbeam https://teamlazerbeam.itch.io/?ac=qfCyYFQF-yt
➡️ More card games https://itch.io/games/tag-card-game?ac=qfCyYFQF-yt

#itchio #indiegames
